bio.brief: An award-winning real estate broker, and recently ranked Top 100 brokers in Crain’s and consistently ranks in the top 10 within @properties, Carrie has earned coveted industry accolades for her performance, as well as consistent compliments from clients who repeatedly refer her business.
bio.full:
Carrie constantly stays on top of sophisticated technology which has made her a forerunner in the marketing and selling of real estate, she has it down to a science. Her talents and on-target recommendations are always based on facts, reliable market analysis, and her vast knowledge of real estate and the market. Patient yet persistent, she is also highly detail oriented and a very determined negotiator.

McCormick is available to clients 24/7. "I communicate often and educate them on the market," she says. "My clients and I are a team. It is important that we work together to create a successful outcome." Selling real estate is about knowing what you are selling and articulating what the value is. Year after year, that focus has led to her placement in the top 1% for the Chicago Association of Realtors. She has also earned the association's Bronze, Silver and Gold awards and been named a Top Social Media Contributor. Last year, she started a podcast to share tips and market information with her colleagues and clients. "My job is to provide a perfect real estate experience for my clients. I have built a support system that does just that".

Knowing that schools are an important factor when buying or selling a home, she partners with schoolsparrow.com and Chicago School GPS to provide additional resources and tools for clients. She also has an extensive social media following, which results in extra online exposure for photos and videos of her listings. Paired with traditional marketing, it's a winning combination.

A certified luxury home marketing specialist, McCormick has an eye for design and assists clients with setting the stage to close the transaction. She is also trained in Relocation and is a member of the National Association of Realtors, the Home Builders Association and Luxury Portfolio. Outside of work, she volunteers at Chicago Realtors to the Rescue, an organization that supports animals.

Prior to joining @properties, Carrie served as National Sales Manager for one of Chicago's largest and well-respected development companies, Centrum Properties. She served as an integral member of the development team, collaborating on product design, development and sales. She was also responsible for implementation of residential marketing and public relations strategies and managing their impact on the company's overall corporate profile.

If you need help in understanding Chicago's complex and ever-changing real estate market, call Carrie McCormick. She is always available.

testimonials.quote: Carrie and her team member Anne went above and beyond with both selling our home and finding us a new place to live. We were outgrowing our condo and looking for a single family home as we are expecting our second child. Our condo had been listed (with a previous agent) for over 6 months, we had limited foot traffic and zero offers. Carrie came in and immediately our sense of hopelessness turned to excitement as we knew we would be selling in the near future. Carrie worked tirelessly to market our unit and she generated a TON of traffic. She found the right buyer in short order and she was able to locate our dream home! We HIGHLY recommend Carrie and our experience was nothing short of ideal. Thanks Carrie and Anne!
Carrie and her team are the Best! From start to finish they were on top of it! In the middle of a crisis they made everything simple easy and got the job done! Couldn't be happier with the results!

We worked with Carrie to find a house in the Chicago area while relocating from California during COVID-19. We are so grateful that we got connected to Carrie, as she made the process - which could have been very challenging - seamless.

Carrie worked with us to help us decided on a location (first deciding between the city and suburbs, and then deciding on a neighborhood), to see properties that fit our needs, and to work through a tough bidding process. Her guidance was calming and ultimately led to us getting the house of our dreams.

As we went through the buying process, we hit natural hiccups and we could always rely on Carrie to help us figure it out. We so appreciate all of her help and guidance. We would recommend her to anyone looking for their dream home!

Carrie made the process of buying and selling as painless as it could possibly be! Her level of professionalism and responsiveness made us feel like we were her top priority throughout our search. Carrie is also incredibly patient and knowledgeable when it comes to home buying/selling. We feel very fortunate to have had the chance to partner with her on what can be a very stressful and intense process. Her team (Anne specifically) was also great to work with. I would recommend Carrie to anyone looking to buy/sell in the Chicagoland area!

I can recommend Carrie and her team without hesitation. Total commitment to professionalism, knowledge of the market and “Chicago Real Estate”. We sold our Lake Shore Drive condo in less then 90 days of listing with Carrie. Marketing materials, pictures and video presentation was extremely well done. Even with COVID Team Carrie got it done! Joe Fazzini

Carrie brings a “can do” approach to every encounter: knowledge , professionalism , excellent communicator and responder who works efficiently with a well organized time.

I have worked with her on a number of challenging deals and I say enough great things about Carrie!!!

Fantastic experience working with Carrie and her team. She was super helpful throughout the entire proess and met our every need. Extremely knowledgable on the market and how best to approach your home purchase.

My experience was nothing short of perfect. Carrie, Including her team and especially Anne, were everything you could hope for in this situation. They were proactive, kind, knowledgeable, had innovative ideas in how to move through situations, were 100% reliable and always took the time to make sure I understood what was being discussed and the consequences. And truly just delightful people to work with. Everyone Carrie recommended I use for various items that needed to be dealt with was also very reliable, reasonably priced and did amazing work. I simply cannot give her any higher marks.

Carrie sold our home within a week and helped us find our dream home !! Her and Ann were amazing to work with ! She was always very responsive and helpful during the whole process. Would highly reccomend.

Working with Carrie to sell my condo was a great experience. She came to our initial meeting well prepared with good knowledge of the market and neighborhood, let me make my listing decision in my own time without pressure, and quickly sprang into action once I was ready to list.

She consistently was able to refer me to quality professionals for legal, painting and repairs and was able to get the place sold quickly for a solid price. Would recommend her to anyone selling in the Chicago area.
